track.name: Otherside (feat. Fences) [Ryan Lewis Remix]
comments: Now this is what I call art. So powerful. [3]
The fact of it is most people that rap like this talkin' about some shit they haven't lived

I love this version of Macklemore. "And We Danced" is everything he talks against in this song.
I hope he doesn't fall any further.

this goes so deep under skin into the bones.. some difference is made by people with thickness to their soul, and it just plain shows. Huge props to everybody who worked at this!! You will  all make it big
Wow i haven't gotten chills from a song in awhile, and this one did it about 5 times.

This is right from the heart,  I have mad respect for Ben Mackemore, it takes a solid person to talk about their struggle with addiction,  and Ryan, well you gotta love Ryan Lewis, lets not forget his awesome talent!!
Now this is what I call art. So powerful. [2] So much emotion in his voice and lyrics and that's what makes him such a good rapper.
This makes me want to kidnap macklemore and tell him how beautiful he is. Fences too. Fences is always beautiful. They're both beautiful. They're all beautiful.
Now this is what I call art. So powerful
He never got - up... He never got - up... He lived on the cusp of death thinkin, it won't be - us.
